meanings.definition: A class of diuretic drugs used to treat high blood pressure and fluid retention.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed chlorothiazides to help lower my blood pressure.
meanings.sent2: Patients often take chlorothiazides to reduce swelling caused by fluid retention.
meanings.sent3: After taking chlorothiazides, I felt like a deflating balloon, losing all that excess water weight.
meanings.sent4: Her body felt like a river flowing freely after starting chlorothiazides.
meanings.sent5: The chlorothiazides worked like a magic spell, making the excess fluid disappear.

meanings.definition: The plural form of chlorothiazide, a specific drug in the chlorothiazide class.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy ran out of chlorothiazides, so I had to wait for a new shipment.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe chlorothiazides to patients with high blood pressure.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled the chlorothiazides all over the counter, creating a little white pile.
meanings.sent4: The chlorothiazides in the bottle seemed to multiply like rabbits, filling up the entire shelf.
meanings.sent5: The chlorothiazides were like tiny soldiers fighting against the excess fluid in my body.
